attributes.action: scrap plans for new trident spend money saved on conventional forces thus bring down unemployment by recruitment
attributes.additional_details: scrap plans for new trident spend money saved on conventional forces thus bring down unemployment by recruitment.  The world has changed the threat that trident was designed for has changed and we as a country can provide better protection for the world by doing what we do best supporting the United Nations look at libya, Iraq, Afganistan, Sierra Leone to name a few we are unable to carry on this work unless we scrap plans to keep trident we are not a world player unless we do this, save lives and jobs now not give jobs to America who are selling us a system we cant afford.
